description.description:
Generate Spirit: 8
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Sunder the earth, impaling the first enemy hit for {#values1} damage.
Earth Spike has a 10% chance to Stun for 2.5 seconds.
Summon a second Earth Spike when hitting an Immobilized or Stunned enemy.
Fortify for 2.4% of your Base Life whenever Earth Spike damages enemies who are Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.

Generate Spirit: 11
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Shapeshift into a Werebear and maul enemies in front of you, dealing {#values1} damage.
If an enemy is hit by Maul, then Fortify for 1.6% of your Base Life.
Maul has a 10% chance to Knock Down enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Increases the range and radius of Maul by 30%.

Generate Spirit: 12
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Conjure a piercing blade of wind, dealing {#values1} damage.
Wind Shear has a 20% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 4 seconds.
Each enemy hit by Wind Shear increases your Movement Speed by +5% for 5 seconds, up to +20%.
Wind Shear grants 3 additional Spirit for each enemy hit beyond the first.

Generate Spirit: 15
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Electricity gathers around your weapon, dealing {#values1} damage to your target and chaining to up to 3 surrounding enemies, dealing 20% less damage each time it chains.
You gain 25% Damage Reduction for 3 seconds after dealing damage with Storm Strike.
Storm Strike has a 15% chance to Immobilize all enemies hit for 2.5 seconds.
Storm Strike has a 50% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Storm Strike chains to 2 additional targets.

Generate Spirit: 9
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Shapeshift into a Werewolf and claw at an enemy for {#values1} damage.
Claw's Attack Speed is increased by +10%.
Claw applies 10.2% Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.
Claw has a 10% chance to attack twice.
After Landslide damages enemies 4 times, the next hit will Immobilize enemies for 3 seconds.
When you strike an Immobilized or Stunned enemy with Landslide, an additional pillar of earth is formed.

When you Immobilize or Stun an enemy, you gain a Terramote. Each enemy hit by Landslide consumes a Terramote causing a guaranteed Critical Strike with x40% Critical Strike Damage. Bosses always have up to a 10% chance to grant a Terramote when hit.
Your next Pulverize will Overpower every 10 seconds while you remain Healthy.
Enemies hit with Pulverize deal 20% reduced damage for 4 seconds.
Enemies are Stunned for 2 seconds when they are Overpowered with Pulverize.
Each time you cast Tornado, you have a 20% chance to spawn an additional Tornado.
Enemies hit with Tornado have a 10% chance to become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Enemies damaged by Tornado are Slowed by 8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 40%.

Spirit Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Shapeshift into a Werewolf and perform a trio of combo attacks:
• 1st Attack: Deal {#values1} damage.
• 2nd Attack: Deal {#values2} damage.
• 3rd Attack: Perform a larger finishing move dealing {#values3} damage.
Shred gains +30% Attack Speed and Heals for 2% of your Maximum Life if an enemy is struck.
Shred's third combo attack is larger and applies an additional {#values1} Poisoning damage over 5 seconds.
Shred's second and third attacks also perform a dash. In addition, Shred's Critical Strike Damage is increased by x20%.

Spirit Cost: {#} per strike
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Conjure a growing lightning storm that deals {#values1} damage per strike and increases the number of strikes the longer it is channeled up to a maximum of 5.
The size of your Lightning Storm is preserved for 4 seconds after channeling.
Lightning Storm has a 8% chance to Immobilize enemies hit for 3 seconds.
Lightning Storm gains 1 additional lightning strike.
Maximum Spirit is increased by {#values1}.
Your Core Skills cost x{#values1} more Spirit but deal x{#values2} increased damage.
Basic Skills generate x{#values1} more Spirit.
Critical Strike Chance against Close enemies is increased by +{#values1}.

You gain {#values1} Damage Reduction while in Werebear form.
This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving Werebear form.

You gain +{#values1} Movement Speed while in Werewolf form.
This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving Werewolf form.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Rocks surround you for 3 seconds, granting a Barrier that absorbs {#values1} of your Base Life in damage.
Earthen Bulwark makes you Unstoppable while active.
Rock shrapnel flies outward when Earthen Bulwark is destroyed or expires, dealing 30% to surrounding enemies. This damage is increased by Barrier bonuses.
Casting Earthen Bulwark grants 18% Base Life as Fortify.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Shapeshift into a Werebear and bellow a mighty roar, reducing Nearby enemies' damage dealt by 50% for 4 seconds.
Debilitating Roar also Fortifies you for 22% Base Life.
Debilitating Roar also Heals you for 4% of your Maximum Life each second for its duration.
Debilitating Roar also Slows enemies by 40% for its duration.
Increase your Non-Physical Resistances by {#values1}.
You gain {#values1} Damage Reduction for 6 seconds after using a Defensive Skill.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Shapeshift into a Werewolf and howl furiously, Healing you for {#values1} of your Maximum Life.
Kills reduce the Cooldown of Blood Howl by 1 second.
Blood Howl also generates 20 Spirit.
Blood Howl also increases your Attack Speed by +15% for 4 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Passive: Powerful winds surround you, granting {#values1} Non-Physical Damage Reduction.
Active: The winds rapidly expand, Knocking Back enemies and dealing {#values2} damage.
Enemies who are Knocked Back by Cyclone Armor are also Slowed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.
Every 10 seconds, Cyclone Armor intensifies, causing incoming damage to grant you 30% Damage Reduction for 2 seconds.
Enemies Knocked Back by Cyclone Armor become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Passive: 1 Ravens fly above you and periodically attack your enemies for 13% damage every 5 seconds.
Active: The target area is swarmed with ravens, dealing {#values1} damage over 6 seconds.
You have +5% increased Critical Strike Chance for 6 seconds against Enemies hit by Ravens.
2 additional Ravens periodically attack enemies.
Enemies inside the swarm of Ravens when it is activated become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Your companions deal x{#values1} bonus damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Passive: A vine creeper periodically emerges from the ground every 7 seconds and applies {#values1} Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to an enemy in the area.
Active: Vines strangle all surrounding enemies, Immobilizing them for 2 seconds and poisoning them for {#values2} damage over 2 seconds.
Vine Creeper's Immobilize duration is increased by 1 second.
Vine Creeper's active Poisoning duration is increased by 3 seconds.
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by +20% against enemies strangled by Vine Creeper.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Passive: Summon 2 wolf companions that bite enemies for {#values1} damage.
Active: Direct your wolves to focus an enemy, leaping to them and striking for {#values2} damage.
Wolves deal x20% increased damage to Immobilized, Stunned, Slowed, or Poisoned enemies.
When you Critically Strike, your Wolves gain +20% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
Lucky Hit: Your Wolves' attacks have up to a 10% chance to Fortify you for 5% Base Life.
Deal x{#values1} increased damage to Distant enemies. Double this bonus if they are also Slowed, Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.
Gain {#values1} Spirit when transforming into Human form.
Lucky Hit: Your Storm Skills have up to a 20% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for {#values1} seconds.
Every {18/15/12/9/6/3/0/-3/-6/-9} seconds, a lightning strike hits a Nearby enemy dealing 45% damage.

Lucky Hit: Dealing Lightning damage to enemies has a {#values1} chance to Immobilize them for 3 seconds.
If the target is already Immobilized, the Lightning damage dealt to them is increased by x{#values2} instead.
Lucky Hit: Up to a {#values1} chance when dealing damage to a Vulnerable, Immobilized or Stunned enemy that a lightning strike also hits dealing 55% damage.
Increase the duration of Hurricane and Cataclysm by x{#values1}.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Unearth a large rolling boulder that Knocks Back and crushes enemies, dealing {#values1} damage with each hit.
When Boulder reaches the end of its path, enemies hit are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds. If Boulder Overpowered, enemies are Stunned for 4 seconds instead.
While you have any Fortify, Boulder has +20% increased Critical Strike Chance.
Boulder's Critical Strike Chance is increased by +3% each time it deals damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Shapeshift into a Werebear, become Unstoppable, and charge forward, dealing {#values1} damage and Knocking Back enemies.
Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain take an additional {#values2} damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.
Trample deals x30% bonus damage. This bonus is reduced by x15% for each enemy hit after the first.
Casting Trample grants 20% Base Life as Fortify.
Casting Trample grants 20 Spirit.
Earth Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage to Slowed, Stunned, Immobilized or Knocked Back enemies.
Critical Strikes with Earth Skills Fortify you for {#values1} Base Life.
While you have Fortify for over [0.5*100|%|] of your Maximum Life, your Earth Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Form a hurricane around you that deals {#values1} damage to surrounding enemies over 8 seconds.
Enemies who are damaged by Hurricane are Slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
Hurricane has a 15% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Enemies affected by Hurricane deal 20% less damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Shapeshift into a Werewolf and perform an infectious bite on the target dealing {#values1} damage, and applying an additional {#values2} Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.
Infected enemies spread Rabies to other surrounding targets.
Rabies' Poisoning damage also increases over the lifetime of the disease, dealing x30% bonus damage at max duration.
Rabies spreads 100% faster.
Rabies deals its total Poisoning damage in 4 seconds instead of 6.
While in Werebear form, you receive +{#values1} additional Healing from all sources.
When you remain in Werebear form for at least {25/20/15/10/5/0/-5/-10/-15/-20} seconds, your next Skill will Overpower.
Poisoned enemies are slowed by {#values1}.
Critical Strikes with Werewolf Skills deal {#values1} of their Base damage as Poisoning damage over 4 seconds.
Poisoned enemies take x{#values1} additional Critical Strike Damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Shapeshift into a Dire Werebear for 10 seconds gaining x20% bonus damage and 20% Damage Reduction. Damage bonus is increased by 3% each second while in this form.
Kills extend the duration by 1 second up to 10 additional seconds.
You are Unstoppable while Grizzly Rage is active.
Gain 8% Base Life as Fortify per second while Grizzly Rage is active.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Encase all Nearby enemies in stone, Stunning them for 3 seconds. You deal x25% increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by Petrify.
Against Bosses, the Critical Strike Damage bonus is increased to x50% and its duration is increased to 6 seconds.
Petrify's effect durations are increased by 1 second.
Killing an enemy affected by Petrify grants 25 Spirit.
Increases the amount of Fortify you gain from all sources by +{#values1}.
Whenever you are Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Down, Fortify for {#values1} Base Life.
Reduce the duration of Control Impairing Effects by {#values1}. Triple this effect while you have Fortify for over 50% of your Maximum Life.
{#values1} chance when struck to Fortify you for 4.4% Base Life.
When a Shapeshifting Skill transforms you into a different form, it deals x{#values1} increased damage.
Shapeshifting Fortifies you for {#values1} Base Life.
Upon shapeshifting into a Werewolf or Werebear, gain {#values1} Damage Reduction against Elites for 5 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Shapeshift into a Werewolf, become Immune and quickly dash 10 times between enemies in the area dealing up to 400% damage.
Each time Lacerate deals a Critical Strike, Heal for 3% Maximum Life.
Lacerate's initial strike is guaranteed to Critically Strike and deals x150% increased damage.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
A massive storm follows you for 8 seconds. Tornadoes Knock Back enemies, and lightning strikes wildly dealing 52% damage.
Cataclysm's duration is increased by 2 seconds.
Lightning strikes from Cataclysm make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
Nature Magic Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage to Elites.
Nature Magic Skills that consume Spirit Heal you for {#values1} of your Maximum Life.
Nature Magic Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage. Triple this bonus if an Earth Skill is the next Skill cast after a Storm Skill, or a  Storm Skill is the next Skill cast after an Earth Skill.

Your Earth Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.
Your Storm Skills deal x{#values2} increased damage to enemies that are Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.

Casting an Earth Skill has a 20% chance to trigger a free Storm Skill of the same category.
In addition, casting a Storm Skill has a 20% chance to trigger a free Earth Skill of the same category.

Lucky Hit: Damaging enemies with Earth Skills has up to a 5% chance to:
• Restore all of your Spirit
• Cause your attacks to be guaranteed Critical Strikes for 5 seconds
This chance is increased by:
• 10% for Critical Strikes
• 10% if the target is Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back
Every 6th Werewolf Skill hit Critically Strikes and deals x60% increased damage.

After being a Werewolf for 2.5 seconds, gain +20% Attack Speed for 15 seconds.
After being a Werebear for 2.5 seconds, deal x20% increased damage for 15 seconds.
Your Storm Skills grant 2 Spirit and deal x20% increased damage when damaging a Vulnerable, Immobilized or Slowed enemy.

Gain x20% additional Maximum Life while in Werebear form and for 3 seconds after leaving Werebear form.
While Healthy, deal x30% increased damage.
